summary: This document outlines the Articles of Incorporation for Financial Infomatics, Inc., established in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It details the corporation's purpose, powers, management structure, and the rights and responsibilities of its stockholders and directors.

persons.name: Erika A. Kellerhals
persons.context: Erika A. Kellerhals is one of the incorporators of Financial Infomatics, Inc., and is mentioned as having subscribed to the Articles of Incorporation.

persons.name: Gregory J. Ferguson
persons.context: Gregory J. Ferguson is also an incorporator of Financial Infomatics, Inc., and is noted for signing the Articles of Incorporation.

persons.name: Brett Geary
persons.context: Brett Geary is listed as an incorporator of Financial Infomatics, Inc., and is mentioned in the context of signing the Articles of Incorporation.

keyFacts: The corporation is named Financial Infomatics, Inc.
The principal office is located in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.
The corporation is authorized to issue 10,000 shares of common stock.
The minimum capital to commence business is set at $1,000.
The document was signed by the incorporators on November 17, 2011.
